lines.text: I wanna be your suck oven.
Love, brain malfunction, what's the difference?
If Time heals all wounds, then does Time wound all heels?
If you weren't so sentiMENTAL, we could have at least sold his ears...
No! Jasper say Bury my Doggy Body. He say he tired. He say he go now. He say... Bye-Bye!
